approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

setOwner.description: Sets a new owner for the contract.

confirmOwnership.description: Confirms the ownership transfer to the new owner.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the amount of allowance a spender has.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the amount of allowance a spender has.

transferERC20Token.description: Transfers ERC20 tokens from the contract to a specified address.

withdrawTeamTokens.description: Withdraws tokens allocated to the team.

NewOwner.description: Emitted when the ownership of the contract changes.

NewPotentialOwner.description: Emitted when a potential new owner is set.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.
